Posts.EditableText: Anyone out there know how to make a 2D array in this psudo-java scripting in Squiffy? Need a way to keep track of a character's progress.

Posts.EditableText: The one who would like to eat sandwich or burger, you must be familiar with Wendy’s. This burger chain has a survey called Talk to Wendy’s or Wendy’s Customer Satisfaction Survey. talktowendys.com survey provides the customers to give their feedback about the food and services provided by the company.
